A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It sucks that this movie is getting so much hate from the "fan boys" 
This movie was a lot to take in.. but it was FANTASTIC!
Rian Johnson changed the game
He just fucked with everything we ever thought we knew and theorized for two years and thru it out the window
Every scene\, every arc 
You think you know where it's going ... and boom !!! 
Surprises and shocks 
And I FUCKEN LOVED IT!!!
He brought into this movie old concepts from the old republic /EU
And call backs from the original movies
Puppets !!!!
he expanded what the force in theory can do
And it was AMAZING !!!
so much info 
So much to take in
Where do we go from here? How is  JJ going to finish this ? How is he going to continue this story from what Rian did?
That's the question ... 
and I don't care\, this was what we needed 
A complete shake up in this universe and yet.... not really
It fits
And I'M ALL IN ... SO IN.. IN ALL THE WAY.
I need to see it again

It dose't matter if you're a all time fan\, or a new fan\, a casual fan..
this movie was beautiful in its own way..
does it have it's faults ? yes... no movie is 100% perfect. 
but this story Rian was trying to tell us\, is what we needed to see\, hear and expereance.
Its a new canon and he did it perfect.
A++++++++++
